column4: Greetings. I am using a dual-boot, Maverick on one HD, WinXP on another. The windows side has become infected with a virus (malware/spyware, pick a term these days right?). What is the best approach to clean the windows side? I scanned that HD with ClamAV but nothing turned up.
you don't understand. the windows side is not usable, even in safe mode
it's actually ubuntu support, since i'm using ubuntu, isn't it?
